Do Luria Delbruck analysis

```{r}
source("http://ljk.imag.fr/membres/Bernard.Ycart/LD/LD.R")
length(LD43a)
LD43a
```
And doing our test is as simple as computing the mean and variance
```{r}
m2 <-signif(mean(LD43a),3)
m2
v2 <-signif(var(LD43a),4)
v2
```

```{r}
leg <-as.list(expression(paste(mu, "= 36.7")), expression(paste(sigma, " = 2068")))
```

```{r}
ex <-expression(atop(mu "= 36.7",sigma "= 2068"))
```
